Num.FuncTxt:
local buff = GetBuffByName(self, 'Overheating_Buff') local over = GetOver(buff) local split = 2 if GetExProp(self, 'ITEM_VIBORA_BULLETMARKER_LV4') > 0 then split = 1 end local value = math.floor(over/split)
if over >= 40 then value = 30 end
if value >= 30 then value = 30 end
return value

Str.FuncTxt: if SKL_CHECK_RIDING_COMPANION_C(self, obj) == 0 then return 'None' else return 'Dummy_emitter_pet' end
if SKL_CHECK_RIDING_COMPANION_C(self, obj) == 0 then return 'None' else return 'Dummy_emitter_pet' end
local func_name = 'get_decrease_heal_debuff_tooltip_' .. TryGetProp(skill, 'ClassName', 'None') local func = _G[func_name] if func == nil then return end return func(skill.Level)

local weapon = GetEquipItem(self, 'LH') if tonumber(USE_SCOUT_MAINWEAPON) == 1 then weapon = GetEquipItem(self, 'RH') end if weapon ~= nil and weapon.ClassType == "Pistol" then return "DoubleGunStance_Buff" end return "None"
